sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import CommonBanner from "../../common/banner/CommonBanner"; import Footer from "../../common/footer/Footer"; import Header from "../../common/header/Header"; import InfoSection from "../../common/infoSection/InfoSection"; class WhoWeAre extends React.Component { render() { return ( <>
Who We Are?

BITS is a renowned software consultancy firm that provides IT consulting services and delivers comprehensive End-End Solutions for software development projects to prestigious companies and esteemed clients in the USA and India. We offer top-notch technology and digital marketing solutions using our in-house automation tools that are customized for each scenario, powered by our data engineering and analytics.

Top Staffing Agency for over a decade

For more than a decade, we have consistently been recognized as one of the leading staffing agencies by clients and companies in the USA and India. Our recruitment and staffing services are highly preferred by our clients, and we offer hundreds of job positions with multiple clients. We receive thousands of job applications from various job portals and our customized job board, as well as our extensive network of contract vendors, through which we have successfully placed many consultants on both contract and full-time basis in the USA and India. Our esteemed clients value us as the top prime vendor partner as we provide qualified, certified, and experienced consultants who often end up working on multiple projects for multiple years for the same client. Many of these consultants are eventually retained and converted into full-time employees.

Placing Right People to Work

The primary challenge in the staffing and recruiting industry is to identify the right talent that can effectively execute job requirements and deliver the desired outcomes. It can be a daunting task to scrutinize and filter candidates, considering various aspects such as domain expertise and experience, which takes up a significant amount of time and effort. There is also the possibility that a consultant who has worked in one domain may not be suitable for a similar or different project in another domain, be it financial or healthcare projects with esteemed clients. However, you can put an end to these problems by partnering with us. We have multiple levels of intense scrutiny, where we personally interview candidates with our in-house technical and HR team and conduct thorough background checks even before submitting the candidate to you. This will save you thousands of dollars per month that would otherwise be spent on trying to find the right talent through popular recruitment job portals.

Software, Web, Mobile and App Development

Software Development and Project Management is an inevitable Process of any Core IT Company be it small or Large. We have a dedicated Team with decades of experience ready to undertake all your Software Development, Web Development, Mobile and App Development and Deliver an Outstanding End Product. Weâ€™re proud to help shape how leading companies structure and manage their business. The Timeline of all the Deliverables in SDLC will be Professionally Tracked, Noted and Followed Up with Core Processes.

You can be a Start-up who are looking for someone to guide you and take care of all aspects Technology and Core process, Digital Marketing to Manifest your ideas into reality or You can a Medium Company looking for someone to Partner with or an International Organization, looking to Outsource all your IT Projects or manage your expansion plans, We Promise you, we will be the Best Partner you desire as we combine our decades of core experience and insights to transform your projects, processes, strategies, Products to Develop Engaging Business Strategies, Design Innovative and High Quality End Products and Solutions to build Rich Brand Experiences and Transform your Organization Entirely to reach New Peaks.

Our Global Reach

Our Global Headquarters is currently based out of Iselin, NJ in USA and Chennai, India and we are soon going to expand our global offices in Canada, UK, Australia, Mexico etc to name a few, to serve various Multinational clients and Government Organizations in Public Private Partnership PPP mode. We undertake the challenges faced by each Organization segregated by with Demographics all over the world and we promise you to deliver excellent solutions to them all and for any New Problem scenarios that arrive, we engineer the most advanced solutions through proper Geo tagged Metrics correlating them with existing Regional and updated geographical Data and enhancing them with our Advanced Predictive AI Algorithms & Data Analytics sampled over large Database.

For over a decade, BITS has been the most preferred Partner with various Public and Private Organizations in India and USA with plans for aggressive expansion all over the world mainly in Canada, UK, Europe, Australia, Mexico as there is an urgent need with huge demand of our services to our esteemed Clientele through our{" "} CCCC Business Engagement Model, ready to deploy solutions for Global challenges and problems.

BITS Services add{" "} Value, Quality, Speed & invent Cost effective Strategies {" "} in all our Business Models. We are Robust, Adaptive, Flexible, and Innovative in implementing and executing our Day-Day activities and Projects with our{" "} CCCC (Core Client-Customer Centric) Business Engagement Model.

We thrive on the kind of change that disrupts, constantly Innovates, rewrites the rules, adapts to New challenges and changes, enhances productivity, reduces the{" "} Cost per object implementation (COI) to successfully Deliver End Product Solutions much before planned deadlines and Project Delivery Time Frame (PDTF).

Technology Focus: Our CCCC{" "} Engagement process focuses on developing Robust Innovative Technology targeted at Client Customer Centric Business Engagement Models and solutions we uniquely develop for each use case scenario categorized across various metrics and Deliverables that are Highly Optimized which provides us with a unique advantage to offer the Best in the World Class Solutions at incredibly quick Turnaround time while simultaneously developing cost effective practices to eliminate excessive, repetitive spend patterns to reduce overall Project Implementation cost as we utilize the saved time and cost to Innovate, develop, implement and execute New diverse features concentrated on ease of use to the End Customer.

Turn-Key Solutions: Our experienced Recruitment Team and a strong in-house database containing 10s & 1000s of Seasoned, certified and highly qualified Consultants help us provide you Turn-Key Solutions to all your Bulk Recruitment needs and deliver Best in the World Staff Augmentation Solutions with our End- End Recruitment Process Life Cycle (RPLC).

Lead Time: Our Strength lies in the quick Turnaround time, an unmatched Industry standard. Our expert team is put on watch to service immediate requirements with the best Profiles in the Industry matching all your core IT requirements and staffing needs and the best part is we do it less than 24 hours and 70% of the time, we give the best fit your IT need, sourced from our large pool of Candidate database consisting of 1000s of seasoned, certified and experienced Consultants spread across varied spectra of Technologies and Domains, which will in turn reduce the Time and Money invested to recruiting Perfect candidates, exponentially making it a Win-Win for all.

{" "}
); } } export default WhoWeAre;
